titles.title: Commemorating the 35th anniversary of broadcasting to Cuba.
Commemorating the 35th anniversary of broadcasting to Cuba.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Western Hemisphere, Civilian Security and Trade.

committee.subcommittee: Western Hemisphere, Civilian Security and Trade
committee.name: House Foreign Affairs

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the role that broadcasting to Cuba serves in providing outside information to the Cuban people and honors those at Radio and TV Martí, administered through the Office of Cuba Broadcasting, for their commitment and dedication to informing the Cuban people.
